goals3Description:
volunteers took
part in our cleanups
mapSectionUpperDescription: Explore our interactive map. Add your data.
mapSectionMiddleDescription: With our live map, you can explore locations where a cleanup is needed. Pick a place, grab your friends — and don't forget to mark it clean at the end! You can also add information like photos, videos and coordinates for other volunteers.
helpSectionTitle:
You can help us
by adding littered locations to the map
